content: Analyze current project structure to understand web content loading architecture
Review git history to understand HTML injection vs direct loading attempts
Find and analyze components responsible for loading/displaying wiki content
Investigate what specifically is broken in the current direct loading approach
Study GE price chart widget requirements and why HTML injection failed
Review WebView settings and configuration for direct page loading
Build and test current app to see direct loading failure firsthand
Understand OSRS wiki page structure and dynamic content requirements
Develop comprehensive strategy to fix direct loading based on findings
Find a working method to navigate to a page with GE charts in the app
Fix primitive styling by implementing proper mobile wiki skin and user agent
Fix MediaWiki skin loading - app shows plain HTML while Chrome shows rich OSRS styling
Fix URL construction to use proper mobile endpoints instead of non-working ?useskin=vector
Improve WebView configuration with proper cache and database settings
Add post-load style enhancement if needed
Test thoroughly with Dragon dagger page and compare to Chrome
